info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:52PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Eddy County through 330 PM MDT... At 251 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Hope to 23 miles west of Seven Rivers Airport. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Artesia, Hope, Seven Rivers Airport, Brantley Lake State Park, Atoka and Artesia Municipal Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
